recipes.label: Send an Irresistible Minion to Ensnare and Disgrace an Annoyance
recipes.startdescription: I want this irritation out of my way. They may even enjoy their downfall.

recipes.label: Send an Alluring Minion to Ensnare and Disgrace an Annoyance
recipes.startdescription: Everyone has a weakness for one particular pleasure. I will send a minion who understands the many natures of pleasure. They will very likely succeed.

recipes.label: Send a Tempting Minion to Ensnare and Disgrace an Annoyance
recipes.startdescription: Who knows if this will succeed? The Annoyance may not find my minion appealing at all.

recipes.label: Offering Temptations to an Annoyance...
recipes.description: My minion has returned. They found a particular temptation to which our Annoyance succumbed readily; at the small cost of the utter destruction of their reputation.

recipes.label: Offering Temptations to an Annoyance...
recipes.description: My minion has returned with disappointing news. They could not find a pleasure that would tempt our Annoyance into folly.

recipes.label: Send an Unstoppable Force to murder an Annoyance
recipes.startdescription: I am out of patience with this nuisance. Unless they have some unusual protection, they're already dead. But their demise will attract attention.

recipes.label: Send a Potent Minion to murder an Annoyance
recipes.startdescription: I am out of patience with this nuisance. This should be an end to the matter. But they could possibly survive, and the attempt will draw attention. [Failure will kill your minion.]

recipes.label: Send a Minion to murder an Annoyance
recipes.startdescription: I want this Annoyance gone. But this approach is risky: my minion's strength is limited. The Annoyance might very easily survive, and the attempt will draw attention. [Failure will kill your minion.]

recipes.label: Send Someone Unsuitable to Murder an Annoyance
recipes.startdescription: My minion lacks the Edge aspect, and is woefully unsuited to attacking the Annoyance. There's a small chance they might succeed. [Failure will kill your minion.]

recipes.label: Ending an Annoyance...
recipes.description: My minion has returned, with a trophy. The Annoyance has been extirpated.

recipes.label: Ending an Annoyance...
recipes.description: My minion has returned, with a prisoner! ...who will have time now to regret his choices.

recipes.label: Ending an Annoyance...
recipes.description: My minion has not returned. They must have failed. This may yet prove embarrassing.

recipes.label: Send a Devious Minion to Drive an Annoyance Insane
recipes.startdescription: I want this irritation out of my way. This scheme will probably succeed, but if it fails, it will draw attention.

recipes.label: Send a Devious Minion to Drive an Annoyance Insane
recipes.startdescription: I want this Annoyance gone. But my minion's abilities are limited. This might very well fail, and if it does, it will draw attention.

recipes.label: Arranging Night Terrors for an Annoyance...
recipes.description: My minion has returned. The Annoyance is no longer capable of lucid speech, let alone capable of annoying me further.

recipes.label: Arranging Night Terrors for an Annoyance...
recipes.description: My minion has returned. The Annoyance has proven more resilient than we had expected. Their mind remains intact.
